lead_paragraph: A Sports of The Times column on Monday, about the success of the young Tampa Bay Rays against the more experienced Red Sox in the American League Championship Series, misstated, in some copies, Boston’s winning streak before Sunday night in postseason games when facing elimination. It was five games — not nine, which had been its streak in such games only in the A.L.C.S.
